channel.title: Changing the fonts (Size of text)
channel.description: I have created a new interface and added some child texts I would like to make it the words or numbers bigger. I don't know if this would be client side or server side? If anyone has the code then please tell me it. Thanks :)

If you made a interface, you should have some code. So show us some code so we know what we’re dealing with.[/quote]

Read full topic
